entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023
